title: How to revert to original settings
body: During the last week, I went on vacation to visit family, and long story short, I ended up playing a bots game of lol on my brothers computer so I wouldn't get rusty. He has changed the settings on his computer to attack move on left click. When I played on his computer (on my account) I am assuming it turned my settings into attack move on left click instead of the default. I went to my regular computer to play and I noticed that his settings were still there. I deleted persisted settings and tried again and now my left click does nothing other than buy things in the shop. I cannot A+left click to attack more or anything. How would I revert to normal since deleting persistent settings did not work for me.

replies.body:
It requires some deep file modifications to make that happen, and isn't something we can support just because of issues like this.  Your best bet would be to reset your config, and that may mean deleting your config folder entirely if removing persistedsettings didn't work.  Just in case make sure to go over these steps accurately-

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings. 

If that doesn't work, delete the Config folder entirely.  I hope that helps!

I tried both of those, deleting those two files and deleting the entire config and the issue is still there. If it helps at all, its as if it doesn't recognize me left clicking at all, which is also super strange. Anything else I would have to do to fix this issue ?

That's strange to hear that the issue persists, and that mouse click isn't being recognized at all.  What happens if you swap you mouse?  Since deleting the entire folder didn't work, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can take a closer look.  Let them know the steps you've tried already, and we'll continue working individually with you.  We'll get back to you!
